title.narrative: WASH assistance to vulnerable groups of IDPs and returnees in prioritized locations in MMC, Jere and Monguno LGAs of Borno State

description.narrative:
Project to provide WASH relief to individuals highlighted in the 90 day humanitarian response plan by the Humanitarian Coordinator in North-East Nigeria. The project will be implemented in IDP Camps and few selected unregistered camps in Monguno, Jere and Maiduguri Municipal Local Government Areas (LGAs). CIDAR proposes to provide access to safe drinking water to affected and vulnerable re-displaced population
Activities to be implemented:
Water supply and water quality surveillance related activities:
A- Drilling, construction and installation of two (02) solar powered hybrid motorized boreholes (SMBH)-cum-hand-pump borehole water facility, Proposed Locations and targeted population: 1. Doro IDP Camp - Jere LGA GPS Coordinates - N 11.880959 E 13.11678 Number of Households - 449 Total Population - 2,694 Population will benefit - 2,267 (34 cubic meter safe water per day)
2. El-Miskin Extension IDP Camp- Jere LGA GPS Coordinates - N 11.85866 E 13.21539 Number of Households - 2,450 Population - 11,352 (Source: CRS, March-2019) Population will benefit - 2,267 (34 cubic meter safe water per day)
B- Rehabilitation, upgrade and routine Operation-Maintenance of broken-down/poorly functioning high-yielding hand-pump to Hybrid Solar Motorized Borehole-cum-hand-pump water facility. Proposed Locations and targeted population: 1. Gana Ali IDP Camp – MongunoLGA GPS Coordinates - N 12.67141 E 13.62468 Number of Households - 1,305 Total Population - 6,154 Population will benefit - 2,267 (34 cubic meter safe water per day)
2. El-Miskin Extension IDP Camp- Jere LGA GPS Coordinates - N 11.88760 E 13.17633 Number of Households - 2,450 Population - 11,352 (Source: CRS, March-2019) Population will benefit - 2,267 (34 cubic meter safe water per day)
Sanitation and Related Activities:
Project proposes to construct 17 Blocks of WASH Sector specified gender segregated latrines and bathing sowers: - 4 latrine compartments and 2 bathing showers compartments in each Block - Maintenance of constructed 17 latrines-shower Blocks throughout the Project Period and gradual handing over to beneficiaries for routine OampM thereafter by forming and training of community based WASHCOMs (user groups)
Hygiene Promotion Activities:
- Hygiene promotion and sensitization for a total population of 24,019 (4,881 households) in following Camps: 1. Doro Camp - 499 Households 2. El-miskin Camp - 1651 Households 3. Madinatu IDP Camp - 1476 Households 4. Gana Ali IDP Camp - 1305 Households
-Distribution of 1,100 NFI / Dignity Kits among most affected and vulnerable families in consultation with Monguno LGA WASH Coordination and Old Maiduguri WASH Coordination Groups
- Awareness generation at household level on effective usages of NFI/Dignity Kits and post-distribution monitoring
- Hygiene awareness generation on hand-washing, safe disposal of solid waste and prevention of cholera and other AWDs
- Distribution of Hygiene Replenishment Kits (multipurpose soaps) to 1,100 families
